com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui
Class KeyBindings

java.lang.Object
  com.immortallabs.cardboard.ui.KeyBindings

public class KeyBindings
extends java.lang.Object

The KeyBindings class models all key binding for the game. If a player changes any key bindings, the class persist it to retain the information for future games.

Operations:
  • The KeyBindings class can get a specific key binding for an action

Version:
1.2, 12/05/08
Author:
Nikhil Kowshik, Immortal Labs CSC309 W09, Thomas Dvornik, RustyNail CSC308 F08
Version History:
- 12/03/08 Version 1.1 Added Version History. Moved all KeyBinding methods and enums to KeyBindings class. Added TODO - 12/05/08 Version 1.2 Finished peusdocode and TODO

Nested Class Summary
static class KeyBindings.KEY_BIND
          KEY_BIND models all the different keyboard bindings for all the different actions.
 
Field Summary
private  java.util.HashMap<KeyBindings.KEY_BIND,java.lang.String> keyBindings
          Holds all the key bindings with their current values.
private static java.lang.String kKeyBuzzFour
          Key for player four to buzz in: NUMPAD 0 key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyBuzzOne
          Key for player one to buzz in: LEFT SHIFT key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyBuzzThree
          Key for player three to buzz in: RIGHT CONTROL key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyBuzzTwo
          Key for player two to buzz in: SPACE key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyDown
          Key for moving the selected card down: DOWN arrow key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyHint
          Key for using a hint: 'H' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyLeft
          Key for moving the selected card left: LEFT arrow key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyPause
          Key for pausing the game: 'P' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyRemoveInlayOne
          Key for moving the first card in the inlay back to the table: '1' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyRemoveInlayTwo
          Key for moving the second card in the inlay back to the table: '2' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyRight
          Key for moving the selected card right: RIGHT arrow key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeySelect
          Key for moving a card from the table to the inlay: ENTER key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyThreeMore
          Key for asking for three more cards: 'T' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyUnpause
          Key for pausing the game: 'R' key on the keyboard
private static java.lang.String kKeyUp
          Key for moving the selected card up: UP arrow key on the keyboard
